description: TypeScript implementation scaffold for a pipeline.

version.description: Pipeline version identifier (not necessarily semver). Examples: v1, 2024-10-01

author.description: GitHub organization or user handle (kebab-case). Used for linking and avatars.

implementation.description: Implementation name nested under the language folder (kebab-case). Defaults to 'default'.

packageName.description: npm package name for the pipeline helpers (use @workspace/ prefix if publishing in this monorepo).

children.template:
# {pipeline} (TypeScript)

TypeScript helpers for the `{pipeline}` pipeline by `{author}`.

- See `schemas/index.json` for optional machine-readable dataset definitions and accompanying Markdown docs.
- Maintain lineage in `moose/lineage.manifest.json` and optionally under `lineage/schemas`.
